paragraphs.p1: Here are some of my projects ...

project1.title: Online CV builder
project1.description: An online tool to create resumes through a pre-built template. Just edit the content of each section to create yours.
project1.techstack: This project was built using React

project2.title: To-do List
project2.description: Interactive to-do list app to keep track of your daily tasks in an oragnized and visual way.
project2.techstack: This project was built using JavaScript, Html and CSS

project3.title: Weather App
project3.description: Weather forecast website using a weather API to fetch data from all over the world. Just search your city !
project3.techstack: This project was built using JavaScript, Html and CSS

project4.title: Star-rating widget
project4.description: Nice little animated star-rating widget compiling scores and using SVGs to display them.
project4.techstack: This project was built using React

project5.title: What'soup?
project5.description: Fun and interactive ramen creation app. Choose your ingredients and create your own ramen bowl, save your recipes and get inspired.
project5.techstack: This project was built using Html, Tailwind CSS, Sass and JavaScript (that was the challenge but the React version will come out soon with more features and more efficient code!

project6.title: Spotify inspired
project6.description: A platform to explore, manage, and organize your favorite playlists and songs
project6.techstack: This project is built using Angular and Angular Material for the front-end, and PHP and mySQL for the backend

project7.title: Activity Management - Recreation Center
project7.description: Website for managing the activities of a recreation center: users, activity creation, bookings...
project7.techstack: This project is built with VueJS and TailwindCSS for the front-end, and PHP, mySQL and Firebase for the back-end.
